DOC.brief_summary: The objective study obtain prospective clinical data safety efficacy Solitaire™ FR device patient diagnose acute ischemic stroke .
DOC.detailed_description: The Study multi-center , single-arm , prospective , observational evaluation . The Solitaire™ FR Device certify CE mark . This protocol evaluate safety efficacy Solitaire™ FR Device use routine practice accord Instructions Use .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject subject 's legally authorize representative sign date Informed Consent Form 2 . Age ≥ 18 < 85 3 . Clinical sign consistent acute ischemic stroke 4 . Thrombolysis Cerebral Infarction ( TICI ) 0 TICI 1 flow proximal anterior intracranial vasculature ( M1 M2 Middle Cerebral Artery ( MCA ) , Internal Carotid Artery ( ICA ) intracranial , Internal Carotid Artery ( ICA ) terminal ) 5 . Presentation within 8 hour stroke onset accord local stroke protocol 6 . If stroke presentation within 4.5 hour , one condition meet : Bridging protocol ( start intravenous continue intraarterial ) ( Up maximum 0.9 mg/kg ) Failed intravenous thrombolysis Direct Intraarterial treatment ( accord institution guideline ) 7 . Subject willing conduct followup visit . 8 . National Institutes Health Stroke Scale ( NIHSS ) ≥ 8 ≤ 30 9 . Modified Rankin Scale ( mRS ) ≤ 2 prior stroke onset 1 . Females pregnant lactate 2 . Known serious sensitivity radiographic contrast agent 3 . Neurological sign rapidly improve prior time treatment 4 . Current participation another investigational drug device study 5 . Life expectancy le 90 day 6 . National Institutes Health Stroke Scale ( NIHSS ) > 30 coma 7 . Uncontrolled hypertension define systolic blood pressure > 185 diastolic blood pressure > 110 control except continuous parenteral antihypertensive medication 8 . Use warfarin anticoagulation International Normalised Ratio ( INR ) > 3.0 9 . Platelet count < 30,000 10 . Glucose < 400 mg/dL 11 . Previous stroke within 30 day 12 . Time symptom onset unknown 13 . Seizure onset stroke 14 . Myocardial infarction infection ( sepsis endocarditis ) 15 . Arterial tortuosity would prevent device reach target vessel 16 . Known hypersensitivity nickeltitanium Imaging 17 . Angiographic evidence carotid dissection , complete cervical carotid occlusion , vasculitis 18 . Stenosis proximal thrombus site may preclude safe recovery device 19 . Brain compute tomography ( CT ) sign hemorrhage , arteriovenous venous malformation , aneurysm 20 . Early ischemic change great 1/3 middle cerebral artery ( MCA ) territory accord brain compute tomography ( CT ) Alberta Stroke Program Early CT ( ASPECT ) score ≤ 6 accord magnetic resonance diffusion weight imaging ( MR DWI ) ASPECT score < 5
